name: Road Stampede - Sky Zoo Safari In Smashy City
name_original: Road Stampede - Sky Zoo Safari In Smashy City
description:
Road Stampede - Sky Zoo Safari is the fast cross road game. This game is is a very addictive endless arcade gameplay!
How far can your animal go? Why did the animals rush on the road? Discover how many roads and logs can the Panda and more animal characters can cross!

Beautiful unique environments and graphics.
Don't let the other animals hit you!
Crossy the Road with highest speed.
Tap the right half of the screen to jump right
Tap the left half to jump left
Collect coins to unlock amazing characters like Pony and leo!

Download Road Stampede - Sky Zoo Safari NOW for Versus Run!
